title: Ralph Fiennes
summary: Ralph Nathaniel Twisleton-Wykeham-Fiennes[lower-alpha 1] (/ˈreɪf ˈfaɪnz/ RAYF FYNEZ;[2] born 22 December 1962) is an English actor, film producer, and director. A Shakespeare interpreter, he first achieved success onstage at the Royal National Theatre. He made his film debut playing Heathcliff in Emily Brontë's Wuthering Heights (1992).
